last_episode_to_air.name: Toast to the Newly Dead
last_episode_to_air.overview: Felix’s wedding fast approaches but can Sister Boniface unveil the killer in the wedding party before the big day?

name: Sister Boniface Mysteries
overview: First there was Father Brown. Now, say hello to Sister Boniface. This clever, moped-riding nun is the police's secret weapon for solving murders in this divine Father Brown spin-off.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Say hello to Sister Boniface. This clever, moped-riding nun is the police's secret weapon for solving murders in this divine Father Brown spin-off.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Criminals, say your prayers. The Cotswolds' crime-solving, Vespa-driving nun returns in this lighthearted Father Brown spin-off. With her aptitude for detective work, Sister Boniface is Great Slaughter's secret weapon when it comes to busting countryside killers.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In Season 3, a famous organist is murdered mid-tune in the chapel, Great Slaughter’s first sci-fi convention results in a mysterious kidnapping, and a ‘dead cert’ at the screen tests for the new ‘Agent Best’ ends up, well… dead. To top it all, Felix has a challenge of his own when his fiancée Victoria arrives from Bermuda with an ultimatum that could change everything…

episodes.name: Unnatural Causes
episodes.overview: The discovery of a housemaid's corpse at a local festival puts a damper on Great Slaughter's jovial gathering.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Murder!
episodes.overview: And...action! On a movie set, the drama really starts when what was thought to be a prop gun turns out to be a real .38 caliber.

episodes.name: Love and Other Puzzles
episodes.overview: After spending the night with a pipe-smoking gentleman caller, a woman is found dead with a jigsaw puzzle and a face full of cold cream.

episodes.name: My Brother's Keeper
episodes.overview: Sister Reginald's ex-con brother Alfie abruptly shows up at the convent after being released from jail. With nowhere to go, the sisters agree to let him stay. But when a well-known artist is found murdered, Alfie begins to look like the prime suspect.

episodes.name: Scoop!
episodes.overview: The body of a high-level government official's secretary is found at the bottom of a staircase - and Sister Boniface claims she was dead before the fall.

episodes.name: Song for the Dead
episodes.overview: The dreamy frontman of buzzy rock'n'roll band The Queenmakers is found dead in the dressing room, just as they are about to go on for their set. Upon inspection, Sister Boniface finds a peculiar sting on the back of his neck.

episodes.name: Dem Bones
episodes.overview: Great Slaughter's annual giant marrow contest is interrupted when a dog digs up some seemingly ancient bones on the site. Is it the archeological discovery of a lifetime? Or is it murder?

episodes.name: Queen of the Kitchen
episodes.overview: Celebrity housewife Prunella Gladwell arrives in Great Slaughter to film a feisty baking competition, and one of the contestants is about to hit her expiration date.

episodes.name: Sister Town
episodes.overview: When a German mayor makes a visit to Great Slaughter to partake in a war memorial ceremony, tragedy strikes. Was it a terrible accident or a malicious plan?

episodes.name: Crimes and Miss Demeanours
episodes.overview: The Miss United contest takes a dive when one of the beauty queens is discovered dead in the pool - and it's not a pretty sight.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Say hello to Sister Boniface. This clever, moped-riding nun is the police's secret weapon for solving murders in this divine Father Brown spin-off.

episodes.name: Don't Try This at Home
episodes.overview: Great Slaughter plays host to the summer roadshow of kids’ TV show ‘Jolly Roger’, much to the annoyance of editor Dinah Morgan. Timbers are soon shivered however when Dinah is discovered smothered onset during a live show. Sister Boniface is called in to investigate who could have committed the deed.

episodes.name: The Shadow of Baron Battenberg
episodes.overview: A sighting of the mysteriously missing Baron Battenberg sends the press and police into a frenzy. Determined to uncover the facts, Ruth and Sam go undercover at the Pranayama retreat, run by the Baron’s widow Marion Grey and brother Edwin Battenberg.

episodes.name: The It Girl
episodes.overview: Peggy is delighted when an old school friend and supermodel Robin returns home to film a documentary but all goes awry once Max Savage, Robin's manager, is found dead locked in his bedroom.

episodes.name: The Book of Shadows
episodes.overview: Sister Boniface and the gang are horrified to discover all the hallmarks of a ritualistic human sacrifice in the woods, supposedly acted out by a coven of witches!

episodes.name: St George's Defence
episodes.overview: Convinced that events catastrophic to the Cold War are being planned at the British Open Chess Championships, Sister Boniface must brush off her chess skills and join the tournament.

episodes.name: A Tight Squeeze
episodes.overview: Felix is a Police Advisor on set of the latest 'Oh! Do Behave!' picture. Felix is soon called to action once the abrasive direction Sexton St Juste is found strangled

episodes.name: Stiff Competition
episodes.overview: Great Slaughter is buzzing with excitement for this year’s talent show! The excitement turns to panic once a magician is murdered due to a trick.

episodes.name: Dead Air
episodes.overview: A new trendy radio station comes to Great Slaughter but soon there is only static once a host is murdered on the air.

episodes.name: Stage Fright
episodes.overview: Great Slaughter's Amateur Dramatic Society's upcoming production turns from drama to disaster once the leading actor is killed by the leading actress.

episodes.name: The Good Samaritan
episodes.overview: When a local resident is found murdered in a method matching that of "The Good Samaritan" killer, Sister Boniface fears the killer is back.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Criminals, say your prayers. The Cotswolds' crime-solving, Vespa-driving nun returns in this lighthearted Father Brown spin-off. With her aptitude for detective work, Sister Boniface is Great Slaughter's secret weapon when it comes to busting countryside killers.

episodes.name: Never Too Deadly to Die
episodes.overview: Sister Boniface is shaken and stirred when one of the screen-testing stars for the new Agent Best film is murdered.

episodes.name: The House of Misfit Dolls
episodes.overview: Sister Boniface finds herself on the hunt for a killer doll when a local toymaker is discovered stabbed to death in a locked room.

episodes.name: Professor Y
episodes.overview: When a 'Professor Y' convention descends on the village, Sister Boniface finds herself investigating the mysterious disappearance of the show's creator.

episodes.name: A Fragrant Scandal
episodes.overview: When the Head Nose of a famous fragrance dynasty is found slain in his study, Sister Boniface must sniff out a killer.

episodes.name: How to Murder a Tune
episodes.overview: Sister Boniface investigates when TV show Glory Be arrives at St Vincent’s and the battle to win chorister of the year turns deadly.

episodes.name: It's Just Not Cricket
episodes.overview: When Great Slaughter Cricket Club’s arrogant star player is murdered, Sister Boniface must do all she can to catch the killer.

episodes.name: A Beautiful World
episodes.overview: Mrs Clam goes undercover when glamourous door-to-door saleswomen arrive in Great Slaughter, bringing makeovers and murder with them.

episodes.name: Toast to the Newly Dead
episodes.overview: Felix’s wedding fast approaches but can Sister Boniface unveil the killer in the wedding party before the big day?

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In Season 3, a famous organist is murdered mid-tune in the chapel, Great Slaughter’s first sci-fi convention results in a mysterious kidnapping, and a ‘dead cert’ at the screen tests for the new ‘Agent Best’ ends up, well… dead. To top it all, Felix has a challenge of his own when his fiancée Victoria arrives from Bermuda with an ultimatum that could change everything…
